p: The red betel ( P. crocatum Ruiz and Pav) leaves that used in this study was obtained from Pabuaran Cilendek Timur, Indonesia and has been identified by Herbarium Bogoriense, Botanical Field Research Center for Biology-Indonesian Institute of Science, Indonesia. RBLE preparation was done by using maceration method. RBLE was obtained from our previous research and stored at -20 °C ( Lister et al., 2019a, 2019b).
